mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ((SELECT NO , 'ME' AS SENDER , TITLE , CONTENT , SEND_DATE , 'S' AS TYPE , 'S' AS READ , 'S' AS IMPORTANCE FROM MAIL WHERE S_STATUS = 'Y' AND SENDER = #{memberNo}) UNION ALL (SELECT MR.NO , E.EMAIL , M.TITLE , M.CONTENT , M.SEND_DATE AS , MR.TYPE , MR.READ , MR.IMPORTANCE FROM MAIL_REF MR INNER JOIN MAIL M ON MR.MAIL_NO = M.NO INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON M.SENDER = E.NO WHERE MR.STATUS = 'Y' AND M.SENDER = #{memberNo})) ORDER BY SEND_DATE DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ((SELECT NO , 'ME' AS SENDER , TITLE , CONTENT , SEND_DATE , 'S' AS TYPE FROM MAIL WHERE S_STATUS = 'Y' AND SENDER = #{memberNo}) UNION ALL (SELECT MR.NO , E.EMAIL , M.TITLE , M.CONTENT , M.SEND_DATE AS , MR.TYPE FROM MAIL_REF MR INNER JOIN MAIL M ON MR.MAIL_NO = M.NO INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON M.SENDER = E.NO WHERE MR.STATUS = 'Y' AND M.SENDER = #{memberNo})) ORDER BY SEND_DATE DESC
